cards.title: Origami Expert
cards.challenge: Using any piece of paper available, fold a paper crane in under 3 minutes. It must be recognizable and able to 'fly' when gently tossed.

cards.title: Drawing Dynamo
cards.description: Showcase your artistic abilities under pressure.
cards.challenge: Draw a self-portrait using your non-dominant hand in 2 minutes. Others must be able to recognize it's supposed to be you.

cards.title: Juggling Genius
cards.challenge: Juggle 3 similar objects (balls, oranges, etc.) for 30 seconds straight, or teach someone else how to juggle if items aren't available.

cards.title: Beatbox Virtuoso
cards.description: Create music with just your voice.
cards.challenge: Perform a 30-second beatbox routine that includes bass, snare, and hi-hat sounds, plus one special effect.

cards.title: Speed Typing Test
cards.challenge: Type this sentence perfectly without looking at the keyboard: 'The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog 123 times!' (Include the exclamation and number)

cards.title: Knot Master
cards.description: Tie knots like a pro sailor.
cards.challenge: Using any rope, string, or shoelaces, tie and name 3 different types of knots, explaining what each is used for.

cards.title: Card Trick Magician
cards.description: Perform magic with a deck of cards.
cards.challenge: Perform a card trick that amazes at least one other player. Explain how it's done after the performance.

cards.title: Speed Stacking
cards.challenge: Using cups, books, or similar objects, build a pyramid stack of at least 10 items and take it down in under 45 seconds total.

cards.title: Voice Impressionist
cards.challenge: Do impressions of 3 different celebrities, cartoon characters, or animals. Others must guess who/what you're imitating.

cards.title: Whistling Wonder
cards.description: Create melodies with just your whistling.
cards.challenge: Whistle the tune of a popular song for 30 seconds. It must be recognizable enough for others to name the song.

cards.title: Calligraphy Artist
cards.challenge: Write your full name in the most beautiful handwriting possible, then teach someone else how to improve their handwriting.

cards.title: Cooking Quick-Fix
cards.description: Create something delicious on the spot.
cards.challenge: Using only ingredients available nearby, create a simple snack or drink recipe and make it for others to taste.

cards.title: Photography Pro
cards.challenge: Take 5 creative photos using any camera/phone showing different techniques: close-up, action, portrait, landscape, and artistic angle.

cards.title: Balance Beam
cards.challenge: Walk in a perfectly straight line heel-to-toe for 20 steps, then turn around and do it backwards with your eyes closed.

cards.title: Speed Reading
cards.description: Read and comprehend at lightning speed.
cards.challenge: Speed-read a page from any book in 60 seconds, then summarize the main points in your own words for the group.
